TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GenericXmlSecurityKeyIdentifierClause extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause

Docs.summary: Represents a key identifier clause that is based on XML.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Xml.XmlElement referenceXml) cil managed

Docs.param: The XML element that represents the key identifier clause. Sets the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.GenericXmlSecurityKeyIdentifierClause.ReferenceXml%2A> property.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class by using the specified XML element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.ClauseType%2A> property is initialized to `null` and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.DerivationLength%2A> property is initialized to zero in the new instance.

MemberSignature.Value: public GenericXmlSecurityKeyIdentifierClause (System.Xml.XmlElement referenceXml, byte[] derivationNonce, int derivationLength);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Xml.XmlElement referenceXml, unsigned int8[] derivationNonce, int32 derivationLength) cil managed

Docs.param: The XML element that represents the key identifier clause. Sets the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.GenericXmlSecurityKeyIdentifierClause.ReferenceXml%2A> property.

An array of <xref:System.Byte> that contains the nonce that was used to create a derived key. Sets the value that is returned by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.GetDerivationNonce%2A> method.
The size of the derived key. Sets the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.DerivationLength%2A> property.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class by using the specified XML element, nonce, and derivation length.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.ClauseType%2A> property is initialized to `null` in the new instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Matches(class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause keyIdentifierClause) cil managed

Docs.param: The key identifier clause to which to compare current instance.
Docs.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether specified key identifier clause matches the current instance.
Docs.returns: if the specified key identifier clause matches the current instance; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks For the match to succeed, the specified key identifier clause must be assignable from <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.GenericXmlSecurityKeyIdentifierClause> and its markup (XML) must match that of this instance. (The <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.OuterXml%2A> property of the element specified by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.GenericXmlSecurityKeyIdentifierClause.ReferenceXml%2A> property is compared for the two instances.)

Docs.summary: Gets the XML element that represents the key identifier clause.
Docs.value: The XML element that represents the key identifier clause.
